channel.title: Calvary Chapel Fort Lauderdale Video Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Calvary Chapel Fort Lauderdale
channel.itunes:summary: The latest messages from the Calvary Chapel Fort Lauderdale Sermon Archive, in video format.
channel.description: The latest messages from the Calvary Chapel Fort Lauderdale Sermon Archive, in video format.
channel.content:encoded: The latest messages from the Calvary Chapel Fort Lauderdale Sermon Archive, in video format.

item.title: Keep the Main Thing, The Main Thing
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Join us as we continue through the Book of 1 Timothy! This weekend, embrace the tension of Paul's advice for Timothy as he navigates many conflicts and cultural issues in Ephesus.
item.description: Join us as we continue through the Book of 1 Timothy! This weekend, embrace the tension of Paul's advice for Timothy as he navigates many conflicts and cultural issues in Ephesus.
item.content:encoded: Join us as we continue through the Book of 1 Timothy! This weekend, embrace the tension of Paul's advice for Timothy as he navigates many conflicts and cultural issues in Ephesus.

item.title: The Real Thing
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Join us as we continue through 1 Timothy 1 together! There are lots of confusing and misleading messages out there, so this weekend, let’s focus on rooting ourselves in the true gospel!
item.description: Join us as we continue through 1 Timothy 1 together! There are lots of confusing and misleading messages out there, so this weekend, let’s focus on rooting ourselves in the true gospel!
item.content:encoded: Join us as we continue through 1 Timothy 1 together! There are lots of confusing and misleading messages out there, so this weekend, let’s focus on rooting ourselves in the true gospel!

item.title: Give them the Keys
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: This weekend, we start a new series through the letters of Paul to his mentee, Timothy! Join the journey of discovering what it means to make disciples and live in truth, love, and on mission as we dive into 1 Timothy 1:1-5.
item.description: This weekend, we start a new series through the letters of Paul to his mentee, Timothy! Join the journey of discovering what it means to make disciples and live in truth, love, and on mission as we dive into 1 Timothy 1:1-5.
item.content:encoded: This weekend, we start a new series through the letters of Paul to his mentee, Timothy! Join the journey of discovering what it means to make disciples and live in truth, love, and on mission as we dive into 1 Timothy 1:1-5.

item.title: Week Four: Yield
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Surrender doesn't always come easy, but it's worth it when you recognize God’s good and trustworthy! As this prayer series comes to a close, remember the importance of yielding your requests to God who will never fail you.
item.description: Surrender doesn't always come easy, but it's worth it when you recognize God’s good and trustworthy! As this prayer series comes to a close, remember the importance of yielding your requests to God who will never fail you.
item.content:encoded: Surrender doesn't always come easy, but it's worth it when you recognize God’s good and trustworthy! As this prayer series comes to a close, remember the importance of yielding your requests to God who will never fail you.

item.title: Week Three: Ask
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Making your requests known to God can be scary, but He wants you to come to Him with all your concerns, needs, and desires! This weekend, discover why and how you can approach God boldly and honestly in prayer!
item.description: Making your requests known to God can be scary, but He wants you to come to Him with all your concerns, needs, and desires! This weekend, discover why and how you can approach God boldly and honestly in prayer!
item.content:encoded: Making your requests known to God can be scary, but He wants you to come to Him with all your concerns, needs, and desires! This weekend, discover why and how you can approach God boldly and honestly in prayer!

item.title: Week Two: Reflect & Rejoice
item.itunes:author: Reuben Ramsaran
item.itunes:summary: This weekend, explore the importance of reflecting and rejoicing in your everyday life! While you grow in your prayer journey, don't miss the opportunity to look to Jesus and practice gratitude intentionally.
item.description: This weekend, explore the importance of reflecting and rejoicing in your everyday life! While you grow in your prayer journey, don't miss the opportunity to look to Jesus and practice gratitude intentionally.
item.content:encoded: This weekend, explore the importance of reflecting and rejoicing in your everyday life! While you grow in your prayer journey, don't miss the opportunity to look to Jesus and practice gratitude intentionally.

item.title: Week One: Pause
item.itunes:summary: Start 2026 focusing on prayer and how to make pausing a regular rhythm in your life! This weekend, discover how Jesus practiced pausing and why prayer matters.
item.description: Start 2026 focusing on prayer and how to make pausing a regular rhythm in your life! This weekend, discover how Jesus practiced pausing and why prayer matters.
item.content:encoded: Start 2026 focusing on prayer and how to make pausing a regular rhythm in your life! This weekend, discover how Jesus practiced pausing and why prayer matters.

item.title: Week Two: Table
item.itunes:subtitle: Extraordinary Christmas
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: This weekend, explore how an ordinary table becomes holy ground. Jesus shared meals with many people while on earth, offering acceptance, redemption, and joy! Come discover how you can experience the beauty of His presence in simple things.
item.description: This weekend, explore how an ordinary table becomes holy ground. Jesus shared meals with many people while on earth, offering acceptance, redemption, and joy! Come discover how you can experience the beauty of His presence in simple things.
item.content:encoded: This weekend, explore how an ordinary table becomes holy ground. Jesus shared meals with many people while on earth, offering acceptance, redemption, and joy! Come discover how you can experience the beauty of His presence in simple things.

item.title: From Comfort to Compassion
item.itunes:author: Reuben Ramsaran
item.itunes:summary: Pastor Ruben's message today will focus on the significance of venturing beyond our comfort zones and showing compassion to others, as Jesus illustrated the parable of the good Samaritan in Luke chapter 10.
item.description: Pastor Ruben's message today will focus on the significance of venturing beyond our comfort zones and showing compassion to others, as Jesus illustrated the parable of the good Samaritan in Luke chapter 10.
item.content:encoded: Pastor Ruben's message today will focus on the significance of venturing beyond our comfort zones and showing compassion to others, as Jesus illustrated the parable of the good Samaritan in Luke chapter 10.

item.title: Loved People, Love People
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: This month, we’ll be going through a teaching series titled, “Love Like Jesus.” In conjunction with Church United, we’ll unite with churches across South Florida to study through the same series. Let’s get ready to learn about how we can authentically reflect Jesus to our community!
item.description: This month, we’ll be going through a teaching series titled, “Love Like Jesus.” In conjunction with Church United, we’ll unite with churches across South Florida to study through the same series. Let’s get ready to learn about how we can authentically reflect Jesus to our community!

Let’s get ready to learn about how we can authentically reflect Jesus to our community!

item.title: Thousand Generations
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In this week's message, Pastor Doug will review the inspiring stories of 1 Samuel and 2 Samuel, reminding us that God is faithful to keep His promises.
item.description: In this week's message, Pastor Doug will review the inspiring stories of 1 Samuel and 2 Samuel, reminding us that God is faithful to keep His promises.
item.content:encoded: In this week's message, Pastor Doug will review the inspiring stories of 1 Samuel and 2 Samuel, reminding us that God is faithful to keep His promises.

item.title: A Generous Legacy
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: This weekend is Commitment Weekend, which means we’ll take action together joyfully giving our commitments for the next generation of Calvary. Let’s celebrate all God is doing as we give and step into the part He’s calling each of us to play!
item.description: This weekend is Commitment Weekend, which means we’ll take action together joyfully giving our commitments for the next generation of Calvary. Let’s celebrate all God is doing as we give and step into the part He’s calling each of us to play!
item.content:encoded: This weekend is Commitment Weekend, which means we’ll take action together joyfully giving our commitments for the next generation of Calvary. Let’s celebrate all God is doing as we give and step into the part He’s calling each of us to play!

item.title: Generations of World Changers
item.itunes:subtitle: Global Missions Weekend
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: This weekend is all about global missions! Jesus calls us to make disciples of all nations, and over the last 40 years, we’ve sent many people to do this around the world. Don't miss the opportunity to learn more about global missions and meet our visiting missionaries!
item.description: This weekend is all about global missions! Jesus calls us to make disciples of all nations, and over the last 40 years, we’ve sent many people to do this around the world. Don't miss the opportunity to learn more about global missions and meet our visiting missionaries!

item.title: Generations of Warriors
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: This weekend, we'll see what David's heart is set on as he nears the end of his life. After reflecting on the faithfulness of God to deliver and guide him, the mighty men who God surrounded David with are also honored!
item.description: This weekend, we'll see what David's heart is set on as he nears the end of his life. After reflecting on the faithfulness of God to deliver and guide him, the mighty men who God surrounded David with are also honored!
item.content:encoded: This weekend, we'll see what David's heart is set on as he nears the end of his life. After reflecting on the faithfulness of God to deliver and guide him, the mighty men who God surrounded David with are also honored!

item.title: Next Gen Weekend
item.itunes:author: Sean Fryer
item.itunes:summary: It's Next Gen Weekend! As we journey through David's song in 2 Samuel 22, join us in reflecting on God's faithfulness to people from every generation. Prepare to hear testimonies from kids to young adults about how God is working in their lives!
item.description: It's Next Gen Weekend! As we journey through David's song in 2 Samuel 22, join us in reflecting on God's faithfulness to people from every generation. Prepare to hear testimonies from kids to young adults about how God is working in their lives!

item.title: The Legacy of a Warrior
item.itunes:author: Javan Shashaty
item.itunes:summary: This weekend, Pastor Javan will guide us through 2 Samuel 20-21 as we see how poor leadership led to ongoing consequences in Israel. Nonetheless, God remains a faithful judge who will also bring gracious redemption to His people!
item.description: This weekend, Pastor Javan will guide us through 2 Samuel 20-21 as we see how poor leadership led to ongoing consequences in Israel. Nonetheless, God remains a faithful judge who will also bring gracious redemption to His people!
item.content:encoded: This weekend, Pastor Javan will guide us through 2 Samuel 20-21 as we see how poor leadership led to ongoing consequences in Israel. Nonetheless, God remains a faithful judge who will also bring gracious redemption to His people!

item.title: The Long Road Home
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: This weekend, be encouraged that failure isn't final! Though grief and regret run deep, God’s redemption runs deeper. Discover how it's never too late to come home, repair what’s broken, and live in a new way!
item.description: This weekend, be encouraged that failure isn't final! Though grief and regret run deep, God’s redemption runs deeper. Discover how it's never too late to come home, repair what’s broken, and live in a new way!
item.content:encoded: This weekend, be encouraged that failure isn't final! Though grief and regret run deep, God’s redemption runs deeper. Discover how it's never too late to come home, repair what’s broken, and live in a new way!

item.title: Vision Weekend 2025
item.itunes:subtitle: Do it again!
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: This weekend, Pastor Doug will reflect on the past 40 years of God's faithfulness at Calvary. Together, we’ll celebrate all the extraordinary things the Lord has done over the past 40 years, get excited for the vision He’s given us for the future, and prepare our hearts to embark on a 40-day prayer journey.
item.description: This weekend, Pastor Doug will reflect on the past 40 years of God's faithfulness at Calvary. Together, we’ll celebrate all the extraordinary things the Lord has done over the past 40 years, get excited for the vision He’s given us for the future, and prepare our hearts to embark on a 40-day prayer journey.
item.content:encoded: This weekend, Pastor Doug will reflect on the past 40 years of God's faithfulness at Calvary. Together, we’ll celebrate all the extraordinary things the Lord has done over the past 40 years, get excited for the vision He’s given us for the future, and prepare our hearts to embark on a 40-day prayer journey.

item.title: Friends and Enemies
item.itunes:subtitle: 2 Samuel 16-17
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: This weekend, we’ll walk through 2 Samuel 16-17 and watch as David walks with humility through the consequences of his past actions. Through it all, we see God's sovereignty at work to restore David and demonstrate His faithfulness. Remember - when all others fail, Jesus Christ will never. He is your forever friend.
item.description: This weekend, we’ll walk through 2 Samuel 16-17 and watch as David walks with humility through the consequences of his past actions. Through it all, we see God's sovereignty at work to restore David and demonstrate His faithfulness. Remember - when all others fail, Jesus Christ will never. He is your forever friend.

Through it all, we see God's sovereignty at work to restore David and demonstrate His faithfulness. Remember - when all others fail, Jesus Christ will never. He is your forever friend.

item.title: The Rebellion
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: This weekend, Pastor Doug will guide us through 2 Samuel 14-15 to explore the consequences of living a life marked by passivity, bitterness, and fear. If we allow cowardice to fuel us, we'll never experience God's power. We need to let Him transform us and break the chains of sinful cycles in our lives.
item.description: This weekend, Pastor Doug will guide us through 2 Samuel 14-15 to explore the consequences of living a life marked by passivity, bitterness, and fear. If we allow cowardice to fuel us, we'll never experience God's power. We need to let Him transform us and break the chains of sinful cycles in our lives.

If we allow cowardice to fuel us, we'll never experience God's power. We need to let Him transform us and break the chains of sinful cycles in our lives.

item.title: Falling Down
item.itunes:subtitle: 2 Samuel 11-12
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing our study through the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug explores 2 Samuel 11–12. In this message, we'll see how sin spirals and what it looks like to truly confess, deal with the consequences, and experience God's mercy.
item.description: Continuing our study through the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug explores 2 Samuel 11–12. In this message, we'll see how sin spirals and what it looks like to truly confess, deal with the consequences, and experience God's mercy.
item.content:encoded: Continuing our study through the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug explores 2 Samuel 11–12. In this message, we'll see how sin spirals and what it looks like to truly confess, deal with the consequences, and experience God's mercy.

item.title: Invited to the Table
item.itunes:subtitle: 2 Samuel 8-10
item.itunes:author: Stephan Tchividjian
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Books of Samuel, in this message, Pastor Stephan Tchividjian will explore 2 Samuel 8–10, where David’s kingdom flourishes through victory, justice, and grace. From battlefield triumphs to covenant kindness toward Mephibosheth, and even conflict born from rejected peace, we’ll see a glimpse of God’s greater kingdom marked by strength, mercy, and faithfulness.
item.description: Continuing through the Books of Samuel, in this message, Pastor Stephan Tchividjian will explore 2 Samuel 8–10, where David’s kingdom flourishes through victory, justice, and grace. From battlefield triumphs to covenant kindness toward Mephibosheth, and even conflict born from rejected peace, we’ll see a glimpse of God’s greater kingdom marked by strength, mercy, and faithfulness.

From battlefield triumphs to covenant kindness toward Mephibosheth, and even conflict born from rejected peace, we’ll see a glimpse of God’s greater kingdom marked by strength, mercy, and faithfulness.

item.title: Building God A House
item.itunes:subtitle: 2 Samuel 7
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Books of Samuel, in this message Pastor Doug Sauder walks us through 2 Samuel 7, where God makes a covenant with David that shapes redemptive history forever.
item.description: Continuing through the Books of Samuel, in this message Pastor Doug Sauder walks us through 2 Samuel 7, where God makes a covenant with David that shapes redemptive history forever.
item.content:encoded: Continuing through the Books of Samuel, in this message Pastor Doug Sauder walks us through 2 Samuel 7, where God makes a covenant with David that shapes redemptive history forever.

item.title: Encountering God's Presence
item.itunes:subtitle: 2 Samuel 6
item.itunes:author: Sean Fryer
item.itunes:summary: In this message, Pastor Sean Fryer explores 2 Samuel 6 as King David brings the Ark of the Covenant to Jerusalem. His passionate worship and reverence for God's presence remind us that our God is holy and worthy of all honor.
item.description: In this message, Pastor Sean Fryer explores 2 Samuel 6 as King David brings the Ark of the Covenant to Jerusalem. His passionate worship and reverence for God's presence remind us that our God is holy and worthy of all honor.
item.content:encoded: In this message, Pastor Sean Fryer explores 2 Samuel 6 as King David brings the Ark of the Covenant to Jerusalem. His passionate worship and reverence for God's presence remind us that our God is holy and worthy of all honor.

item.title: Fighting For The King
item.itunes:subtitle: 2 Samuel 5
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder explores 2 Samuel 5, where David's crowned king over all Israel. In this message, we see how God’s promise is fulfilled and discover how David's reign points us to a greater King and a kingdom that cannot be shaken.
item.description: Continuing through the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder explores 2 Samuel 5, where David's crowned king over all Israel. In this message, we see how God’s promise is fulfilled and discover how David's reign points us to a greater King and a kingdom that cannot be shaken.
item.content:encoded: Continuing through the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder explores 2 Samuel 5, where David's crowned king over all Israel. In this message, we see how God’s promise is fulfilled and discover how David's reign points us to a greater King and a kingdom that cannot be shaken.

item.title: Who's In Charge?
item.itunes:subtitle: 2 Samuel 2-4
item.itunes:author: Reuben Ramsaran
item.itunes:summary: This weekend, Pastor Reuben Ramsaran will explore 2 Samuel 2–4, where David begins his rise—but not without conflict. These chapters show a kingdom divided, power struggles, and painful losses. Discover how everything changes when we know God's in charge and submit to His authority.
item.description: This weekend, Pastor Reuben Ramsaran will explore 2 Samuel 2–4, where David begins his rise—but not without conflict. These chapters show a kingdom divided, power struggles, and painful losses. Discover how everything changes when we know God's in charge and submit to His authority.
item.content:encoded: This weekend, Pastor Reuben Ramsaran will explore 2 Samuel 2–4, where David begins his rise—but not without conflict. These chapters show a kingdom divided, power struggles, and painful losses. Discover how everything changes when we know God's in charge and submit to His authority.

item.title: Tragedy Is Not Your Destiny
item.itunes:subtitle: 1 Samuel 31 - 2 Samuel 1
item.itunes:author: Chris Baselice
item.itunes:summary: In this message, Pastor Chris Baselice shares from 1 Samuel 31 and 2 Samuel 1 as we learn about the end of King Saul's reign and life, while also exploring both the tragedy of a wasted life and the grief we can experience even for those with whom we have a complicated relationship.
item.description: In this message, Pastor Chris Baselice shares from 1 Samuel 31 and 2 Samuel 1 as we learn about the end of King Saul's reign and life, while also exploring both the tragedy of a wasted life and the grief we can experience even for those with whom we have a complicated relationship.
item.content:encoded: In this message, Pastor Chris Baselice shares from 1 Samuel 31 and 2 Samuel 1 as we learn about the end of King Saul's reign and life, while also exploring both the tragedy of a wasted life and the grief we can experience even for those with whom we have a complicated relationship.

item.title: God is my Strength
item.itunes:author: Forrest Brown, Santiago Amin
item.itunes:summary: Continuing our study through 1 Samuel, we explore 1 Samuel 29–30 as David hits rock bottom, seeks God, finds strength, and rises to recover what was lost. These chapters show us how to respond when life unravels—not with despair, but with faith and pursuit.
item.description: Continuing our study through 1 Samuel, we explore 1 Samuel 29–30 as David hits rock bottom, seeks God, finds strength, and rises to recover what was lost. These chapters show us how to respond when life unravels—not with despair, but with faith and pursuit.
item.content:encoded: Continuing our study through 1 Samuel, we explore 1 Samuel 29–30 as David hits rock bottom, seeks God, finds strength, and rises to recover what was lost. These chapters show us how to respond when life unravels—not with despair, but with faith and pursuit.

item.title: The Sound Of Silence
item.itunes:subtitle: 1 Samuel 28
item.itunes:author: Javan Shashaty
item.itunes:summary: Where do you turn when you're desperate? Continuing our study through 1 Samuel, Pastor Javan Shashaty unpacks 1 Samuel 28 and the last days of the reign of King Saul. Together, we'll see another cautionary tale from Saul as he falls further away from the Lord in his desperation and delves into some dark stuff in his search for answers.
item.description: Where do you turn when you're desperate? Continuing our study through 1 Samuel, Pastor Javan Shashaty unpacks 1 Samuel 28 and the last days of the reign of King Saul. Together, we'll see another cautionary tale from Saul as he falls further away from the Lord in his desperation and delves into some dark stuff in his search for answers.
item.content:encoded: Where do you turn when you're desperate? Continuing our study through 1 Samuel, Pastor Javan Shashaty unpacks 1 Samuel 28 and the last days of the reign of King Saul. Together, we'll see another cautionary tale from Saul as he falls further away from the Lord in his desperation and delves into some dark stuff in his search for answers.

item.title: Don’t Play the Fool
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing our study through 1 Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through 1 Samuel 25 where we find the story of David, a man named Nabal, and his wife Abigail. In this message, we go deep into the difference between being a wise person and a foolish person.
item.description: Continuing our study through 1 Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through 1 Samuel 25 where we find the story of David, a man named Nabal, and his wife Abigail. In this message, we go deep into the difference between being a wise person and a foolish person.
item.content:encoded: Continuing our study through 1 Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through 1 Samuel 25 where we find the story of David, a man named Nabal, and his wife Abigail. In this message, we go deep into the difference between being a wise person and a foolish person.

item.title: Looking for Justice
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: What do you do when you're desperate? Continuing our study through 1 Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder unpacks 1 Samuel 22-24, where we find David is on the run! Learn how to fight spiritual battles in the face of fatigue and depletion and how to walk through these hard seasons in a way that honors the Lord and doesn't lead to moral compromise.
item.description: What do you do when you're desperate? Continuing our study through 1 Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder unpacks 1 Samuel 22-24, where we find David is on the run! Learn how to fight spiritual battles in the face of fatigue and depletion and how to walk through these hard seasons in a way that honors the Lord and doesn't lead to moral compromise.
item.content:encoded: What do you do when you're desperate? Continuing our study through 1 Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder unpacks 1 Samuel 22-24, where we find David is on the run! Learn how to fight spiritual battles in the face of fatigue and depletion and how to walk through these hard seasons in a way that honors the Lord and doesn't lead to moral compromise.

item.title: When Life Turns Upside Down
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: What do you do when life throws you a curveball, or when your world is turned upside down? Continuing through the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder unpacks 1 Samuel 21–22:5 as we see David on the run.
item.description: What do you do when life throws you a curveball, or when your world is turned upside down? Continuing through the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder unpacks 1 Samuel 21–22:5 as we see David on the run.
item.content:encoded: What do you do when life throws you a curveball, or when your world is turned upside down? Continuing through the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder unpacks 1 Samuel 21–22:5 as we see David on the run.

item.title: A Love that Doesn’t Give Up
item.itunes:subtitle: 1 Samuel 19
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through our study of the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder shares from 1 Samuel 19:11-20:42. In this special Mother's Day message, we'll explore the very meaning of love and see how God's love is greater than anything else, how it impacts every part of our lives, and how we live in light of it!
item.description: Continuing through our study of the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder shares from 1 Samuel 19:11-20:42. In this special Mother's Day message, we'll explore the very meaning of love and see how God's love is greater than anything else, how it impacts every part of our lives, and how we live in light of it!

item.title: The Superpower of Humility
item.itunes:author: Reuben Ramsaran
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through our study of the Books of Samuel, Pastor Reuben Ramsaran takes us 1 Samuel 18-19:10. Watch as Saul begins to grow fearful of David, all the while David and Saul's son Jonathan grow to become best friends. Discover the beauty and power of true Christian friendship and what it means to advocate for someone.
item.description: Continuing through our study of the Books of Samuel, Pastor Reuben Ramsaran takes us 1 Samuel 18-19:10. Watch as Saul begins to grow fearful of David, all the while David and Saul's son Jonathan grow to become best friends. Discover the beauty and power of true Christian friendship and what it means to advocate for someone.

Watch as Saul begins to grow fearful of David, all the while David and Saul's son Jonathan grow to become best friends. Discover the beauty and power of true Christian friendship and what it means to advocate for someone.

item.title: David & Goliath: The Story inside the Story
item.itunes:subtitle: 1 Samuel 17
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through our study of the Books of Samuel, in this message Pastor Doug Sauder teaches from 1 Samuel 17 as we unpack one of the most famous stories in history: the battle between David and Goliath. Discover the story within the story God was weaving through this battle and how it ultimately points to and centers on the battle Jesus fought for us!
item.description: Continuing through our study of the Books of Samuel, in this message Pastor Doug Sauder teaches from 1 Samuel 17 as we unpack one of the most famous stories in history: the battle between David and Goliath. Discover the story within the story God was weaving through this battle and how it ultimately points to and centers on the battle Jesus fought for us!

Discover the story within the story God was weaving through this battle and how it ultimately points to and centers on the battle Jesus fought for us!

item.title: The Anointing
item.itunes:subtitle: 1 Samuel 16
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In week 12 of the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches from 1 Samuel 16 as we arrive at the moment the Lord calls Samuel to anoint David as the next king of Israel. Learn what it means to be anointed and how His Spirit can work in each of us!
item.description: In week 12 of the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches from 1 Samuel 16 as we arrive at the moment the Lord calls Samuel to anoint David as the next king of Israel. Learn what it means to be anointed and how His Spirit can work in each of us!

item.title: Three Ways to Blow Up Your Life
item.itunes:subtitle: 1 Samuel 15
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In week 11 of the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder shares about God's rejection of Saul as king of Israel in 1 Samuel 15. Together, we'll discuss three ways we can mess up our lives and learn how to respond to correction.

item.title: 1 Chasing 1000
item.itunes:subtitle: 1 Samuel 14
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In week 10 of the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches from 1 Samuel 14 and unpacks what happens when Jonathan, son of Saul, faces impossible odds in battle. Discover the simplicity and power of genuine faith.

item.title: I Hate To Say I Told You So
item.itunes:author: Chris Baselice
item.itunes:summary: In week nine of the Books of Samuel, Pastor Chris Baselice will teach from 1 Samuel 13 as we reflect on how God's ways are always better.

item.title: The DNA of a Servant Leader
item.itunes:subtitle: 1 Samuel 12
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In week eight of the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches from 1 Samuel 12 as we examine how a servant leader shares their life with others, prays for their people, and how they use their authority.

item.title: The Perfect Start
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In week seven of the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder explores 1 Samuel 9-11 as we see the anointing of Saul as king of Israel. Discover the importance of being open to the things God wants to do in and through you, why we all need spiritual mentors, and how to set your identity in what God says about you, and not what others say.

item.title: Give Us a King
item.itunes:author: Javan Shashaty
item.itunes:summary: In week six of the Books of Samuel, we unpack 1 Samuel 8 as Israel asks for a king. In this message, Pastor Javan Shashaty shares how we can combat the desire to be like everyone else and learn how to fight idolatry in our heart.

item.title: Uncomfortable Presence
item.itunes:author: Duane Roberts
item.itunes:summary: In week four of the Books of Samuel, Pastor Duane Roberts unpacks 1 Samuel 5-6. In this message, we learn about God's power and glory, as well as how He tears down idols and uses things to draw us closer to Himself.

item.title: The Glory Departs
item.itunes:subtitle: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In week 3 of the Books of Samuel, Pastor Doug Sauder unpacks 1 Samuel 4 as we learn about Israel’s fallout after losing the ark of the covenant, the weight of our sin, and what our relationship with the Lord is and isn't.

item.title: Hearing Gods Voice in a Broken Family
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In part two of "Samuel," Pastor Doug Sauder teaches from 1 Samuel 2:12-3:21 as we explore what the fear of the Lord means, how to honor God in your house, and how to create space to hear from God.

item.title: The Struggle Becomes the Song
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Thank you for joining us this weekend as we kick off the Books of Samuel! In this message, Pastor Doug Sauder will explore 1 Samuel 1-2:11 and show us the power of persistent prayer and faith. Learn from Hannah how to bring your problems to God, what to do in the waiting period, and how to turn your suffering into worship.

item.title: Life Giving
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In the conclusion of this three-part series, Pastor Doug Sauder explores how a Christian should view money, how generosity changes us, and the difference between an abundance mindset and a scarcity mindset.
item.description: In the conclusion of this three-part series, Pastor Doug Sauder explores how a Christian should view money, how generosity changes us, and the difference between an abundance mindset and a scarcity mindset.

item.title: Life Purpose
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In part two of "Life to the Full," Pastor Doug Sauder explains the purpose of life and the part generosity plays in it as we walk through the Parable of the Talents.
item.description: In part two of "Life to the Full," Pastor Doug Sauder explains the purpose of life and the part generosity plays in it as we walk through the Parable of the Talents.

item.title: Life Edit
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Kicking off this special three-part series, Pastor Doug Sauder shares what it looks like to be generous with our time. Discover how your greatest ability in the kingdom of God is your availability, how to readjust your schedule and priorities to align with God, and how to get the most out of every second!

Discover how your greatest ability in the kingdom of God is your availability, how to readjust your schedule and priorities to align with God, and how to get the most out of every second!

item.title: Let Earth Receive Her King
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In part three of "Let Earth Receive Her King," this year's special Christmas series. we dive into Luke 1, Isaiah 9, and Daniel 2 as Pastor Doug Sauder explores the kingship of Jesus.
item.description: In part three of "Let Earth Receive Her King," this year's special Christmas series. we dive into Luke 1, Isaiah 9, and Daniel 2 as Pastor Doug Sauder explores the kingship of Jesus.

item.title: The Lord Has Come
item.itunes:author: Chris Baselice
item.itunes:summary: Thank you for joining us this weekend as we continue "Let Earth Receive Her King," this year's special Christmas series. In this message, Pastor Chris Baselice dives into Luke 2:1-12 and explore what it means that the Lord has come. Journey with us as we track the coming of the Messiah through the Old Testament leading up to Jesus' birth!
item.description: Thank you for joining us this weekend as we continue "Let Earth Receive Her King," this year's special Christmas series. In this message, Pastor Chris Baselice dives into Luke 2:1-12 and explore what it means that the Lord has come. item.title: Joy To The World
item.itunes:summary: In week one of "Let Earth Receive Her King," this year’s Christmas series, Pastor Doug Sauder explores the joy of the Christmas season, why we sing songs of praise, and how true joy can only be found in a relationship with Jesus.

item.title: Songs of Thanksgiving
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In the final week of "Psalms: Songs of the Soul," Pastor Doug Sauder explores the thanksgiving psalms. Discover the importance of giving thanks to the Lord, why there's ALWAYS a reason to give thanks, and how living with an attitude of gratitude truly changes your life!
item.description: In the final week of "Psalms: Songs of the Soul," Pastor Doug Sauder explores the thanksgiving psalms. Discover the importance of giving thanks to the Lord, why there's ALWAYS a reason to give thanks, and how living with an attitude of gratitude truly changes your life!

item.title: Songs of Repentance
item.itunes:author: Reuben Ramsaran
item.itunes:summary: In week six of "Psalms: Songs of the Soul," Pastor Reuben Ramsaran explores the repentance psalms. Discover the importance and freeing power of bringing your shortcomings to God.
item.description: In week six of "Psalms: Songs of the Soul," Pastor Reuben Ramsaran explores the repentance psalms. Discover the importance and freeing power of bringing your shortcomings to God.

item.title: Songs Of Royalty
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In week five of "Psalms: Songs of the Soul," Pastor Doug Sauder explores the group of psalms known as royal or Messianic psalms. In this message, you'll discover how these songs of the soul pointed to the coming of Jesus.

item.title: Songs of Pilgrimage
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In week four of "Psalms: Songs of the Soul," Pastor Doug Sauder will walk us through the pilgrimage psalms, a 15-chapter section that deals with the issues of life. Learn how to walk through every leg of the journey of life with the Lord and discover the power of reflection as you write your own psalm to the Lord.
item.description: In week four of "Psalms: Songs of the Soul," Pastor Doug Sauder will walk us through the pilgrimage psalms, a 15-chapter section that deals with the issues of life. Learn how to walk through every leg of the journey of life with the Lord and discover the power of reflection as you write your own psalm to the Lord.

Learn how to walk through every leg of the journey of life with the Lord and discover the power of reflection as you write your own psalm to the Lord.

item.title: Psalms of Lament
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In week three of "Psalms: Songs of the Soul," we explore both the lament and imprecatory (those that seek judgment or justice upon enemies of God) psalms. In this message, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches us the importance of walking through sadness, grief, anger, and indignation in a healthy, godly way, as well as how to own your feelings instead of enthroning them.
item.description: In week three of "Psalms: Songs of the Soul," we explore both the lament and imprecatory (those that seek judgment or justice upon enemies of God) psalms. In this message, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches us the importance of walking through sadness, grief, anger, and indignation in a healthy, godly way, as well as how to own your feelings instead of enthroning them.

In this message, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches us the importance of walking through sadness, grief, anger, and indignation in a healthy, godly way, as well as how to own your feelings instead of enthroning them.

item.title: Psalms of Praise
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In week two of "Songs of the Soul," our exploration of the Book of Psalms, we study the category of psalms known as praise psalms. In this unique message, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches us the seven Hebrew words for praise as we learn how to live in a posture of praise!
item.description: In week two of "Songs of the Soul," our exploration of the Book of Psalms, we study the category of psalms known as praise psalms. In this unique message, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches us the seven Hebrew words for praise as we learn how to live in a posture of praise!

item.title: Psalms of Wisdom
item.itunes:subtitle: Psalms
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Kicking off a seven-week exploration of the Book of Psalms, this message focuses on the category called the wisdom psalms. Focusing on Psalm 1, 19, and 119, Pastor Doug Sauder explores how these unique psalms reflect on what wisdom truly is, where we find it, and what building our lives on the Word of God looks like.
item.description: Kicking off a seven-week exploration of the Book of Psalms, this message focuses on the category called the wisdom psalms. Focusing on Psalm 1, 19, and 119, Pastor Doug Sauder explores how these unique psalms reflect on what wisdom truly is, where we find it, and what building our lives on the Word of God looks like.

item.title: Who’s your One | Doug Sauder | Matthew 28:18-27
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In part two of Vision Weekends, Pastor Doug Sauder invites us to ponder the question, "Who is my one?" as we discover the power and impact of personally investing in the lives of the people God has placed in our lives.
item.description: In part two of Vision Weekends, Pastor Doug Sauder invites us to ponder the question, "Who is my one?" as we discover the power and impact of personally investing in the lives of the people God has placed in our lives.

item.title: Go and Make
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: This special message serves as both the conclusion of our journey through the Gospel of Matthew and as week one of our two-part Vision Weekends. Hear from Pastor Doug Sauder as he shares stories and testimonies about all God has been doing over the last year and how He’s called us to continue to take up the call of Matthew 28:19-20 to "make disciples."
item.description: This special message serves as both the conclusion of our journey through the Gospel of Matthew and as week one of our two-part Vision Weekends. Hear from Pastor Doug Sauder as he shares stories and testimonies about all God has been doing over the last year and how He’s called us to continue to take up the call of Matthew 28:19-20 to "make disciples."

item.title: See For Yourself
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: As we come close to the conclusion of this amazing journey through the Gospel of Matthew, Pastor Doug Sauder will be taking us through Matthew 27:57-28:14. Together, we’ll study and celebrate Jesus' resurrection and see the many reactions different people had to it.
item.description: As we come close to the conclusion of this amazing journey through the Gospel of Matthew, Pastor Doug Sauder will be taking us through Matthew 27:57-28:14. Together, we’ll study and celebrate Jesus' resurrection and see the many reactions different people had to it.

item.title: The Whole Story
item.itunes:author: Chris Baselice
item.itunes:summary: In this message, we'll study Matthew 27:1-56 as Pastor Chris Baselice walks us through the events of the cross from the end of Jesus' trial to His death.
item.description: In this message, we'll study Matthew 27:1-56 as Pastor Chris Baselice walks us through the events of the cross from the end of Jesus' trial to His death.

item.title: Singing In The Dark
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, this message takes us through Matthew 26 as Pastor Doug Sauder explores the significance of Jesus' anointing in Bethany, the plot to kill Jesus, the last supper, and Jesus' prayer in the Garden of Gethsemane just before His arrest, and His trial.
item.description: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, this message takes us through Matthew 26 as Pastor Doug Sauder explores the significance of Jesus' anointing in Bethany, the plot to kill Jesus, the last supper, and Jesus' prayer in the Garden of Gethsemane just before His arrest, and His trial.

item.title: Biblical Prophecy Seminar
item.itunes:subtitle: With David Guzik
item.itunes:author: David Guzik
item.itunes:summary: Have you ever wondered what biblical prophecy is all about? In this special seminar with pastor, teacher, and Bible commentator David Guzik, you'll hear a thorough overview of biblical prophecy and a Q&A session.
item.description: Have you ever wondered what biblical prophecy is all about? In this special seminar with pastor, teacher, and Bible commentator David Guzik, you'll hear a thorough overview of biblical prophecy and a Q&A session.

item.title: Ready for the End
item.itunes:author: David Guzik
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message special guest Pastor David Guzik unpacks Matthew 24 as Jesus tells His disciples about the end times. Discover what it means to be ready for the end as we unpack Jesus' prophetic words and warnings.

item.title: Ready Or Not
item.itunes:author: Duane Roberts
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Duane Roberts takes us through Matthew 25:1-30 as we discover the importance of being focused on the mission of the gospel and living each moment as if Jesus' return was imminent.
item.description: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Duane Roberts takes us through Matthew 25:1-30 as we discover the importance of being focused on the mission of the gospel and living each moment as if Jesus' return was imminent.

item.title: Take off the Mask
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 23. In this message, we’ll read through some very harsh warnings and “woes” from Jesus regarding hypocrisy.
item.description: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 23. In this message, we’ll read through some very harsh warnings and “woes” from Jesus regarding hypocrisy.

item.title: Who Jesus Really Is
item.itunes:author: Alan Platt
item.itunes:summary: Continuing with our study through Matthew, special guest Alan Platt unpacks Matthew 22:15-46 as we see Jesus interact with various groups who came to challenge Him with questions. Watch and learn how to deal with difficult questions, skeptics, and those who are hostile toward Christianity in a Christ-like way.

item.title: Don't Miss It
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 21:28-22:14. In this message, we see Jesus share three different parables regarding entry into God's kingdom, judgment, and why we must be ready for His return at all times.
item.description: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 21:28-22:14. In this message, we see Jesus share three different parables regarding entry into God's kingdom, judgment, and why we must be ready for His return at all times.

item.title: I Pledge Allegiance
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Kicking off part five of the Matthew series, Pastor Doug Sauder unpacks Matthew 21:1-27. In this message, we’ll see Jesus ride into Jerusalem just days before His crucifixion. Together, we’ll learn what it means to be a citizen and ambassador of God's kingdom in this fallen world and how to do so like Jesus did!

item.title: I (De)serve
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Doug Sauder unpacks Matthew 20 as Jesus teaches a powerful parable, heals two blind men, and explains how one becomes truly great in His kingdom!
item.description: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Doug Sauder unpacks Matthew 20 as Jesus teaches a powerful parable, heals two blind men, and explains how one becomes truly great in His kingdom!

item.title: Nothing's Impossible
item.itunes:author: Chris Baselice
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, Pastor Chris Baselice unpacks Matthew 19. In this message, we explore Jesus' teaching on marriage and divorce as well as the true cost of following Him.

item.title: Manuals Matter
item.itunes:author: Reuben Ramsaran
item.itunes:summary: In this message, Pastor Reuben Ramsaran unpacks Matthew 18 as we learn what it means to be great in God’s kingdom. Discover the power of childlike faith, the eternal value of serving others with our lives, how to deal with sin in our lives and the church, and the passion with which our Father pursues us!
item.description: In this message, Pastor Reuben Ramsaran unpacks Matthew 18 as we learn what it means to be great in God’s kingdom. Discover the power of childlike faith, the eternal value of serving others with our lives, how to deal with sin in our lives and the church, and the passion with which our Father pursues us!

Discover the power of childlike faith, the eternal value of serving others with our lives, how to deal with sin in our lives and the church, and the passion with which our Father pursues us!

item.title: Mount of Transfiguration
item.itunes:author: Stephan Tchividjian
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message we'll study Matthew 17 as Pastor Stephan Tchividjian unpacks one of the most unique events in the Gospels: the transfiguration of Jesus. What does it mean and why did it happen?
item.description: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message we'll study Matthew 17 as Pastor Stephan Tchividjian unpacks one of the most unique events in the Gospels: the transfiguration of Jesus. What does it mean and why did it happen?

item.title: Give Me a Sign
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 16 as we see Jesus share about different signs and warnings regarding the kingdom of God.
item.description: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 16 as we see Jesus share about different signs and warnings regarding the kingdom of God.
item.content:encoded: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 16 as we see Jesus share about different signs and warnings regarding the kingdom of God.

item.title: Breaking Tradition
item.itunes:author: Duane Roberts
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message we look at Matthew 15 as Pastor Duane Roberts examine three different interactions with Jesus: the Pharisees, a Canaanite woman, and a hungry crowd of people who weren't believers. Discover how the Lord calls us to interact with those around us, even if it means breaking traditions and comfort zones.
item.description: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message we look at Matthew 15 as Pastor Duane Roberts examine three different interactions with Jesus: the Pharisees, a Canaanite woman, and a hungry crowd of people who weren't believers. Discover how the Lord calls us to interact with those around us, even if it means breaking traditions and comfort zones.

Discover how the Lord calls us to interact with those around us, even if it means breaking traditions and comfort zones.

item.title: Jesus' Long Day
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing our study through the Gospel of Matthew, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches from Matthew 14:13-36. In this special Mother's Day message, we examine one of the most well-known miracles of Jesus—the feeding of the 5,000—and discover the beauty and impact of love, obedience, and faith!
item.description: Continuing our study through the Gospel of Matthew, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches from Matthew 14:13-36. In this special Mother's Day message, we examine one of the most well-known miracles of Jesus—the feeding of the 5,000—and discover the beauty and impact of love, obedience, and faith!

item.title: Stories of the Kingdom
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing our study through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 13:31-58. Together, we'll explore several parables told by Jesus and their meaning, learn why He spoke in parables, and discover how to apply these powerful stories into our lives.
item.description: Continuing our study through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 13:31-58. Together, we'll explore several parables told by Jesus and their meaning, learn why He spoke in parables, and discover how to apply these powerful stories into our lives.

item.title: Good Soil, Good Seed
item.itunes:author: Duane Roberts
item.itunes:summary: Continuing our study through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Duane Roberts teaches from Matthew 13:1-30 and 36-43. Together, we'll explore one of the most powerful parables Jesus ever told: the Parable of the Sower and the Seeds.
item.description: Continuing our study through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Duane Roberts teaches from Matthew 13:1-30 and 36-43. Together, we'll explore one of the most powerful parables Jesus ever told: the Parable of the Sower and the Seeds.

item.title: Breaking Strongholds
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: What is spiritual warfare? How do we fight it? Continuing our study through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 12:22-50. Together, we'll learn the difference between demonic possession and oppression, how to break free from the things that hold us down, and the power of intercessory prayer.
item.description: What is spiritual warfare? How do we fight it? Continuing our study through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 12:22-50. Together, we'll learn the difference between demonic possession and oppression, how to break free from the things that hold us down, and the power of intercessory prayer.
item.content:encoded: What is spiritual warfare? How do we fight it? Continuing our study through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 12:22-50. Together, we'll learn the difference between demonic possession and oppression, how to break free from the things that hold us down, and the power of intercessory prayer.

item.title: Recover Your Life
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing our study through the Gospel of Matthew, this weekend we’ll dive in to Matthew 11:25-12:21 as Pastor Doug Sauder explores the importance of rest, how to rest well according to the Bible, how to guard your soul, and what it means to rest in Jesus.
item.description: Continuing our study through the Gospel of Matthew, this weekend we’ll dive in to Matthew 11:25-12:21 as Pastor Doug Sauder explores the importance of rest, how to rest well according to the Bible, how to guard your soul, and what it means to rest in Jesus.
item.content:encoded: Continuing our study through the Gospel of Matthew, this weekend we’ll dive in to Matthew 11:25-12:21 as Pastor Doug Sauder explores the importance of rest, how to rest well according to the Bible, how to guard your soul, and what it means to rest in Jesus.

item.title: What Do I Do With My Doubt?
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Have you ever experienced doubt? You're not alone! Continuing our study through the Gospel of Matthew, Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 11:1-24. In our time together, we'll discover how to walk through doubt in a healthy, biblical way and learn what Jesus can do with your doubt!
item.description: Have you ever experienced doubt? You're not alone! Continuing our study through the Gospel of Matthew, Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 11:1-24. In our time together, we'll discover how to walk through doubt in a healthy, biblical way and learn what Jesus can do with your doubt!

In our time together, we'll discover how to walk through doubt in a healthy, biblical way and learn what Jesus can do with your doubt!

item.title: Marching Orders
item.itunes:author: Chris Baselice
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, we'll dive into Matthew 10. On this special Palm Sunday weekend, Pastor Chris Baselice from our Plantation campus outlines the mission of Jesus. Discover why this mission is so important, what it requires, what it will cost you, and most importantly what awaits you on the other side of it!
item.description: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, we'll dive into Matthew 10. On this special Palm Sunday weekend, Pastor Chris Baselice from our Plantation campus outlines the mission of Jesus. Discover why this mission is so important, what it requires, what it will cost you, and most importantly what awaits you on the other side of it!

item.title: New Wine
item.itunes:subtitle: Matthew Series
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, we dive into Matthew 9:9-38 as Pastor Doug Sauder teaches us why we can't mix our old way of living and thinking with our new life in Christ. We'll also discover why Jesus wants to do a new thing in our lives and how we can pursue it!
item.description: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, we dive into Matthew 9:9-38 as Pastor Doug Sauder teaches us why we can't mix our old way of living and thinking with our new life in Christ. We'll also discover why Jesus wants to do a new thing in our lives and how we can pursue it!

item.title: What Kind Of Man Is This?
item.itunes:subtitle: Matthew Series
item.itunes:author: Duane Roberts
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, Pastor Duane Roberts explores the question, “Who is this man?” as we dive into Matthew 8:23-9:8. Learn about the power of Jesus to calm both external and internal storms and what can happen when we bring people to Him!
item.description: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, Pastor Duane Roberts explores the question, “Who is this man?” as we dive into Matthew 8:23-9:8. Learn about the power of Jesus to calm both external and internal storms and what can happen when we bring people to Him!

item.title: The God Who Heals
item.itunes:subtitle: Matthew Series
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message dive into Matthew 8:1-22 and see the healing power of Jesus at work through various miraculous encounters. Learn about the role our faith actually plays in the work of God as we unpack a healthy and biblically faithful understanding of healing.
item.description: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message dive into Matthew 8:1-22 and see the healing power of Jesus at work through various miraculous encounters. Learn about the role our faith actually plays in the work of God as we unpack a healthy and biblically faithful understanding of healing.

item.title: Building a Kingdom Life
item.itunes:subtitle: Matthew Series
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 7. In this message, we examine Jesus’ statement about judging others, learn the difference between what’s true and false regarding the way of Jesus and the teaching of Jesus, and what happens when we build our lives in the way of His teaching!
item.description: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 7. In this message, we examine Jesus’ statement about judging others, learn the difference between what’s true and false regarding the way of Jesus and the teaching of Jesus, and what happens when we build our lives in the way of His teaching!

item.title: The Real Treasure
item.itunes:subtitle: Matthew Series
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 6:19-34. In this message, we’ll examine what has mastery in our lives, what our vision is like, and where our treasure truly lies. Learn to trust God with your time, talent, treasure, and ultimately with your life while not giving in to worry and anxiety.
item.description: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Matthew 6:19-34. In this message, we’ll examine what has mastery in our lives, what our vision is like, and where our treasure truly lies. item.title: Audience of ONE
item.itunes:subtitle: Matthew Series
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message we'll dive into Matthew 6:1-18 as Pastor Doug Sauder teaches us the what, why, and how of praying, fasting, and giving.
item.description: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message we'll dive into Matthew 6:1-18 as Pastor Doug Sauder teaches us the what, why, and how of praying, fasting, and giving.

item.title: The Tale of Two Hearts
item.itunes:subtitle: Matthew Series
item.itunes:author: Stephan Tchividjian
item.itunes:summary: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Stephan Tchividjian takes us through Matthew 5:17-48 as we see Jesus flip everything we thought we knew upside down. Discover what the kingdom of God truly looks like and how we can walk in it together.
item.description: Continuing through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Stephan Tchividjian takes us through Matthew 5:17-48 as we see Jesus flip everything we thought we knew upside down. Discover what the kingdom of God truly looks like and how we can walk in it together.

item.title: Global Weekend 2024
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: It's Global Weekend! In this message, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches us what it means to be salt and light in our community and across the world as we hear how the Lord is working through missionaries in different countries. We also learn how we can be part of the work!
item.description: It's Global Weekend! In this message, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches us what it means to be salt and light in our community and across the world as we hear how the Lord is working through missionaries in different countries. We also learn how we can be part of the work!

item.title: The Blessed Life
item.itunes:subtitle: Matthew Series
item.itunes:author: Chris Baselice
item.itunes:summary: Continuing our journey through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Chris Baselice explores Matthew 5:1-12 as we begin to examine Jesus' most famous message, the Sermon on the Mount. Learn where true happiness comes from in God's kingdom through this study of the Beatitudes.
item.description: Continuing our journey through the Gospel of Matthew, in this message Pastor Chris Baselice explores Matthew 5:1-12 as we begin to examine Jesus' most famous message, the Sermon on the Mount. Learn where true happiness comes from in God's kingdom through this study of the Beatitudes.

item.title: The Fight Before the Fight
item.itunes:subtitle: Matthew Series
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In this message, Pastor Doug Sauder will take us through Matthew 4 and the temptation of Jesus in the wilderness by Satan. Together, we’ll learn how to overcome the attacks of the enemy through the power of the Word of God.
item.description: In this message, Pastor Doug Sauder will take us through Matthew 4 and the temptation of Jesus in the wilderness by Satan. Together, we’ll learn how to overcome the attacks of the enemy through the power of the Word of God.

item.title: Get Ready
item.itunes:subtitle: Matthew Series
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Kicking off part two of the Gospel of Matthew, we read through Matthew 3. In this message, Pastor Doug Sauder explores how John the Baptist paved the way and prepared the people for the coming of the kingdom of God. We also discover the power of repentance and what happens when we embrace the identity God's gives us!
item.description: Kicking off part two of the Gospel of Matthew, we read through Matthew 3. In this message, Pastor Doug Sauder explores how John the Baptist paved the way and prepared the people for the coming of the kingdom of God. We also discover the power of repentance and what happens when we embrace the identity God's gives us!

item.title: A Different Kind of King
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In week three of this special Christmas series, we read through Matthew 2:1-12 as Pastor Doug Sauder shows us how the wise men came to see Jesus and brought Him three special gifts. Discover why Jesus is a greater kind of King than the world has ever seen and how we can surrender and serve the King!
item.description: In week three of this special Christmas series, we read through Matthew 2:1-12 as Pastor Doug Sauder shows us how the wise men came to see Jesus and brought Him three special gifts. Discover why Jesus is a greater kind of King than the world has ever seen and how we can surrender and serve the King!

item.title: Joseph Says Yes
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In week two of this special Christmas series, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches from through Matthew 1:18-25 and 2:13-23 as we learn what it looks like to trust and obey God when things don't make sense and how God can use your faithfulness to change the world.
item.description: In week two of this special Christmas series, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches from through Matthew 1:18-25 and 2:13-23 as we learn what it looks like to trust and obey God when things don't make sense and how God can use your faithfulness to change the world.

item.title: One of Us
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In part one of this special Christmas series, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches from Matthew 1:1-17 as we look at the genealogy of Jesus and explore the question “What if God was one of us?"
item.description: In part one of this special Christmas series, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches from Matthew 1:1-17 as we look at the genealogy of Jesus and explore the question “What if God was one of us?"
item.content:encoded: In part one of this special Christmas series, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches from Matthew 1:1-17 as we look at the genealogy of Jesus and explore the question “What if God was one of us?"

item.title: Tables, Not Walls
item.itunes:author: Duane Roberts
item.itunes:summary: Concluding this special series, Pastor Duane Roberts walks us through Luke 5:27-32 and explains why Christians are called to build tables of connection, not walls of separation, with people who don’t know Jesus as we build relationships and demonstrate the love of Jesus.
item.description: Concluding this special series, Pastor Duane Roberts walks us through Luke 5:27-32 and explains why Christians are called to build tables of connection, not walls of separation, with people who don’t know Jesus as we build relationships and demonstrate the love of Jesus.

item.title: Don't Miss the Party
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing this special series, we'll look at the Parable of the Lost Son and see how, unlike the older brother in the story, we're called to see those who are far from God with eyes of empathy and compassion.
item.description: Continuing this special series, we'll look at the Parable of the Lost Son and see how, unlike the older brother in the story, we're called to see those who are far from God with eyes of empathy and compassion.

item.title: A Seat at God's Table
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Kicking off a special three-week series in partnership with dozens of churches throughout South Florida, Pastor Doug Sauder shares from Luke 7:36-50 as we're reminded of God’s love for us and encouraged to embrace the same heart towards the people in our community who don't know Jesus.
item.description: Kicking off a special three-week series in partnership with dozens of churches throughout South Florida, Pastor Doug Sauder shares from Luke 7:36-50 as we're reminded of God’s love for us and encouraged to embrace the same heart towards the people in our community who don't know Jesus.

item.title: A Party For The Ages
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In the conclusion to this epic story, Pastor Doug Sauder will take us through Esther 9:17-10:3 as we discover how God is always working a good plan for His people, even if that plan rarely happens as we think it should. We'll also learn the importance of celebrating God's work in, through, and around us. and what it truly means to live with hope!
item.description: In the conclusion to this epic story, Pastor Doug Sauder will take us through Esther 9:17-10:3 as we discover how God is always working a good plan for His people, even if that plan rarely happens as we think it should. We'll also learn the importance of celebrating God's work in, through, and around us. and what it truly means to live with hope!

item.title: The Good Fight
item.itunes:subtitle: Esther 8-9:16
item.itunes:author: Javan Shashaty
item.itunes:summary: Continuing our journey through Esther, Pastor Javan Shashaty takes us through Esther 8-9:16 as we see Esther intercede for her people and ultimately save them as the king grants the Jews the right to defend themselves from those would seek to destroy them. Through this, we'll discover how God's sovereignty and our responsibility go hand-in-hand.
item.description: Continuing our journey through Esther, Pastor Javan Shashaty takes us through Esther 8-9:16 as we see Esther intercede for her people and ultimately save them as the king grants the Jews the right to defend themselves from those would seek to destroy them. Through this, we'll discover how God's sovereignty and our responsibility go hand-in-hand.

Through this, we'll discover how God's sovereignty and our responsibility go hand-in-hand.

item.title: Dinner for Three
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing our journey through the Book of Esther, in this message we study Esther 5:4-7:10 as we discover the biblical formula for facing challenges, how to live courageously on mission, what it practically looks like to listen for God's voice, and where pride eventually leads a person.
item.description: Continuing our journey through the Book of Esther, in this message we study Esther 5:4-7:10 as we discover the biblical formula for facing challenges, how to live courageously on mission, what it practically looks like to listen for God's voice, and where pride eventually leads a person.

item.title: She Stands
item.itunes:subtitle: Esther 4
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing our journey through the Book of Esther, Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Esther 4:4-5:3 as we learn what it looks like to wait on the Lord, to submit to His will for our lives, and courageously step into divine moments.
item.description: Continuing our journey through the Book of Esther, Pastor Doug Sauder takes us through Esther 4:4-5:3 as we learn what it looks like to wait on the Lord, to submit to His will for our lives, and courageously step into divine moments.

item.title: He Will Not Bow
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing our journey through the Book of Esther, in this message Pastor Doug takes us through Esther 3-4:3 as we explore what it means to live without compromise in the face of evil and discover the godly way to respond to persecution and the sinfulness around us.

item.title: The Orphan and The Beauty Pageant
item.itunes:subtitle: Esther 2
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Continuing our journey through the Book of Esther, Pastor Doug Sauder walks us through Esther 2 as we see the moment Esther becomes queen. In this message, we'll also explore what simple faithfulness and doing the right thing looks like even in difficult situations.

item.title: Prologue: A King's Ego
item.itunes:subtitle: Esther 1
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Kicking off our seven-part journey the epic and powerful story of Esther, Pastor Doug Sauder teaches from Esther 1. In this message, we set the stage for the incredible work God would do and explore dangers of pride and the far-reaching effects our sins can have on others.

item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: In part two of this Vision Weekend series, Pastor Doug dives deeper into what it means to go after the one as well as learn how we can get involved in the work God is doing.

item.title: For The One
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: Hear from Pastor Doug Sauder as he shares a powerful message looking back at what the Lord has done through Vision 2023 over the last five years and looking ahead to where He's leading us in this new season!

item.title: I Believe in God
item.itunes:author: Chris Baselice
item.itunes:summary: What beliefs make up the foundation of the Christian faith? How do these beliefs shape and transform people’s lives? Kicking off this special five-week series exploring the essential doctrines of Christianity, Pastor Chris Baselice unpacks who God is, what we believe about Him, and how knowing Him changes everything!
item.description: What beliefs make up the foundation of the Christian faith? How do these beliefs shape and transform people’s lives? Kicking off this special five-week series exploring the essential doctrines of Christianity, Pastor Chris Baselice unpacks who God is, what we believe about Him, and how knowing Him changes everything!

Kicking off this special five-week series exploring the essential doctrines of Christianity, Pastor Chris Baselice unpacks who God is, what we believe about Him, and how knowing Him changes everything!

item.title: I Believe in the Bible
item.itunes:author: Andrew Wooddell
item.itunes:summary: What is the Bible? How do we know it's true and authoritative? How do we engage with Scripture? In week two of this special series, Pastor Andrew Wooddell explores the purpose and power of the Bible, why we trust it, how we can know God and find the answers to life through it!
item.description: What is the Bible? How do we know it's true and authoritative? How do we engage with Scripture? In week two of this special series, Pastor Andrew Wooddell explores the purpose and power of the Bible, why we trust it, how we can know God and find the answers to life through it!

In week two of this special series, Pastor Andrew Wooddell explores the purpose and power of the Bible, why we trust it, how we can know God and find the answers to life through it!

item.title: I Believe in the Gospel
item.itunes:author: Duane Roberts
item.itunes:summary: What is the gospel? In week three of the "I Believe" series, Pastor Duane Roberts explains what the message we call the gospel truly is, what makes it such good news, how we can embrace it, and how we live in light of it!
item.description: What is the gospel? In week three of the "I Believe" series, Pastor Duane Roberts explains what the message we call the gospel truly is, what makes it such good news, how we can embrace it, and how we live in light of it!

item.title: I Believe in the Church
item.itunes:author: Stephan Tchividjian
item.itunes:summary: What is the church? In week four of the "I Believe" series, Pastor Stephan Tchividjian shares why we gather and how God works in and through us when we gather. We also discover why every believer is important and valuable as part of the church and discuss the role and mission of the church in our lives, homes, communities, and the world.

We also discover why every believer is important and valuable as part of the church and discuss the role and mission of the church in our lives, homes, communities, and the world.

We also discover why every believer is important and valuable as part of the church and discuss the role and mission of the church in our lives, homes, communities, and the world.

item.title: I Believe in the Mission
item.itunes:author: Doug Sauder
item.itunes:summary: What is the mission of Christianity? Concluding the "I Believe" series, Pastor Doug Sauder explores why we're here, what our purpose is, and how we can live out our God-given calling and be part of God's work of redemption in the world.

item.title: Fruit of the Spirit: Love
item.itunes:subtitle: Good Fruit
item.itunes:author: Duane Roberts
item.itunes:summary: In week one of this study on the fruit of the Spirit, Pastor Duane Roberts explores the godly attribute of love. See how the Lord displayed love in the Old Testament, how Jesus gave us an example in the New Testament, how the early church exhibited love, and how you can walk in this fruit today!
item.description: In week one of this study on the fruit of the Spirit, Pastor Duane Roberts explores the godly attribute of love. See how the Lord displayed love in the Old Testament, how Jesus gave us an example in the New Testament, how the early church exhibited love, and how you can walk in this fruit today!

item.title: Fruit of the Spirit: Joy
item.itunes:subtitle: Good Fruit
item.itunes:summary: In week two of our exploration of the Fruit of the Spirit from Galatians 5:22-23, we'll learn about the godly attribute of joy. In this message, Pastor Fidel Gomez shows us why joy is a decision we make and not something we feel, how Christian joy is different from anything else in the world, and how you can walk in the true joy that comes from knowing Jesus!
item.description: In week two of our exploration of the Fruit of the Spirit from Galatians 5:22-23, we'll learn about the godly attribute of joy. In this message, Pastor Fidel Gomez shows us why joy is a decision we make and not something we feel, how Christian joy is different from anything else in the world, and how you can walk in the true joy that comes from knowing Jesus!

item.title: Fruit of the Spirit: Peace
item.itunes:subtitle: Good Fruit
item.itunes:author: Bernard King
item.itunes:summary: In part three of "Good Fruit," special guest Pastor Bernard King dives into the godly attribute of peace, the third of fruit of the Spirit listed in Galatians 5:22-23. In this message, we'll see how the Lord brought peace to people in the Old Testament, how Jesus gave us an example in the New Testament, how the early church experienced peace, and how you can walk in this fruit!
